name: Ancestral Healing
text: Restore a minion\nto full Health and\ngive it Taunt.
flavor: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Beakered Lightning
text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: Working in a shaman's lab, it's important to be well-grounded.

name: Mutate
text: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: You'll get the transformation you want when murlocs fly.

name: Totemic Might
text: Give your Totems +2_Health.
flavor: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Totemic Surge
text: Give your Totems +2_Attack.
flavor: It's not really advanced shamanic magic, you just draw nasty eyebrows on them.

name: Zap!
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: The material components for this spell are wool socks and a rug.

name: Air Elemental
text: Can't be targeted by spells or Hero Powers.
flavor: Makes a mean puff pastry.

name: Blazing Invocation
text: Discover a Battlecry minion.
flavor: A lot of shaman have started vaping their invocations.

name: Command the Elements
text: [x]Questline: Play 3 cards with Overload. Reward: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: What, you expected a shaman to have trouble with a place called STORMWIND?

name: Corrupt the Waters
text: [x]Quest: Play 6 Battlecry\ncards.\nReward: Heart of Vir'naal.
flavor: This is why Hagatha is banned from public pools.

name: Dust Devil
text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Earth Shock
text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

name: Evolve
text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

name: Finders Keepers
text: Discover a card with_Overload. Overload: (1)
flavor: INFINITE LOOP!

name: Forked Lightning
text: Deal $2 damage to 2_random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Frost Shock
text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavor: FROST SHOCK!

name: Investment Opportunity
text: [x]Draw an Overload card.
flavor: "It's a real fixer-upper. I mean a REAL fixer upper."

name: Invocation of Frost
text: Freeze an enemy. \nInvoke Galakrond.
flavor: Galakrond adores a little frosting.

name: Lightning Bolt
text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Novice Zapper
text: Spell Damage +1 Overload: (1)
flavor: The novices would prefer that he did not.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

name: Overdraft
text: [x]Tradeable Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals to deal that much damage.
flavor: Wait. It costs mana to be out of mana?!

name: Primal Fusion
text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

name: Revolve
text: Transform all minions into random ones with the same Cost.
flavor: "Please don't ride the carousel for thirty minutes after eating. After the carousel eats, I mean."

name: Sludge Slurper
text: Battlecry: Add a Lackey to your hand. Overload: (1)
flavor: You can't stop slurping this delicious sludge!

name: Spawnpool Forager
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Tinyfin.
flavor: Putting food on the table requires persistence, enthusiasm, and the finest murloc Gloves of Foraging.

name: Spirit Claws
text: [x]Has +2 Attack while you\nhave Spell Damage.
flavor: They'll be MUCH easier to use once they add the spiritthumb.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Storm's Wrath
text: Give your minions +1/+1.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: How many dragons does it take to destroy a hot air balloon? One, two, three, CRUNCH!

name: Surging Tempest
text: Has +1 Attack while you_have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "Overloaded? Should've gotten a surge protector."

name: Totemic Smash
text: Deal $2 damage. Overkill: Summon a basic Totem.
flavor: Trolls are the first group to have a totem survive atmospheric re-entry.

name: Tunnel Trogg
text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.
howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Unite the Murlocs
text: [x]Quest: Summon\n10 Murlocs.\nReward: Megafin.
flavor: Form feet and legs!  Form arms and body!  Oh.  Sorry.  I was thinking about Mechafin.

name: Unstable Evolution
text: Transform a friendly minion into\none that costs (1) more. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: They grow up so fast.

name: Voltaic Burst
text: Summon two 1/1 Sparks with Rush. Overload: (1)
flavor: Batteries have three components: Cathode, Anode, and Overload.

name: Wailing Vapor
text: [x]After you play an Elemental,\ngain +1 Attack.
flavor: If you have The Vapors, your Humors might be imbalanced.

name: Wartbringer
text: Battlecry: If you played 2_spells this turn, deal 2_damage.
flavor: “Does she cause them with magic, or just…like have a bucket she brings with her?”

name: Witch's Apprentice
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Add a random Shaman spell to your hand.
flavor: Is she a frog that became a witch, or a witch that became a frog?

name: Ancestral Knowledge
text: Draw 2 cards. Overload: (2)
flavor: MOMMMMMYYYYYYYYY!!!

name: Ancestral Spirit
text: Choose a minion. When that minion is destroyed, return it to the battlefield.
flavor: It was just a flesh wound.

name: Auctionhouse Gavel
text: [x]After your hero attacks, reduce the Cost of a Battlecry minion in your hand by (1).
flavor: "I want to be a judge! Or an auctioneer! Look, all I want is one of those sweet, tiny hammers."

name: Big Bad Voodoo
text: Give a friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon a random minion that costs (1) more."
flavor: Murlocs practice Small Nice Voodoo.

name: Bolner Hammerbeak
text: [x]After you play a Battlecry\nminion, repeat the first\n__Battlecry played this turn._
flavor: Show him how to do something once, and he can do it a thousand times. This turn.

name: Brrrloc
text: Battlecry: Freeze an_enemy.
flavor: He may be frozen fish, but he fights fresh!

name: Cagematch Custodian
text: Battlecry: Draw a weapon.
flavor: Cleans up after a dust up.

name: Chain Lightning (Rank 1)
text: Deal $2 damage to a minion and a random adjacent one. (Upgrades when you have 5 Mana.)
flavor: Still better than receiving a chain letter.

name: Crackle
text: Deal $3-$6 damage. Overload: (1)
flavor: Snap! This card! Pop!

name: Crushing Hand
text: Deal $8 damage to a minion. Overload: (3)
flavor: Shamans always have the firmest handshakes.

name: Cryostasis
text: Give a minion +3/+3 and Freeze it.
flavor: We'll thaw you out when we find a cure!

name: Deathmatch Pavilion
text: Summon a 3/2 Duelist.\nIf your hero attacked this turn, summon another.
flavor: Worth it for the stuffed toy at the end.

name: Devolve
text: Transform all enemy minions into random ones that cost (1) less.
flavor: Ragnaros looked down. He looked like some kind of War Golem. "WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME," he yelled. But all that came out was a deep grinding sound. He began to cry.

name: Diligent Notetaker
text: Spellburst: Return the spell to your hand.
flavor: You never know what cards are going to be on the test.

name: Earthen Might
text:
[x]Give a minion +2/+2.
If it's an Elemental, add
a random Elemental
to your hand.
flavor: Or it might not.

name: Elementary Reaction
text: Draw a card. Copy it if_you played an Elemental last turn.
flavor: It's just a Tempest Tantrum.

name: Eternal Sentinel
text: Battlecry: Unlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: Just try to avoid eye contact.

name: EVIL Totem
text: At the end of your turn,\nadd a Lackey to your hand.
flavor: A lot of people blame the parents when a totem goes bad.

name: Explosive Evolution
text: Transform a minion into a random one that costs (3) more.
flavor: Let's give a big hand for goblin experimentation!

name: Fire Plume Harbinger
text: Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of Elementals in your hand_by (1).
flavor: Good for summoning elementals. Great for making s'mores.

name: Firemancer Flurgl
text: [x]After you play a Murloc,\ndeal 1 damage to\nall enemies.
flavor: Diss tracks spitting straight fire.

name: Flametongue Totem
text: Adjacent minions have +2_Attack.
flavor: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Ghost Light Angler
text: Echo
flavor: BoOooOogrglgrlgrlooOoOoo!

name: Ice Fishing
text: Draw 2 Murlocs from your deck.
flavor: Glow fish, war fish... blow fish, more fish...

name: Jade Claws
text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.\nOverload: (1)@Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "Best manicure ever!" - Aya Blackpaw

name: Kobold Hermit
text: Battlecry: Choose a basic Totem. Summon it.
flavor: To truly understand candles, it takes YEARS of quiet contemplation.

name: Landslide
text: [x]Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. If you're Overloaded, deal $1 damage again.
flavor: "And they win it by a landslide! Wait, where did all the other racers go?"

name: Lava Shock
text: Deal $2 damage.\nUnlock your Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: Chocolate lava cake is shockingly delicious.
howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Likkim
text: Has +2 Attack while you have Overloaded Mana Crystals.
flavor: "I double frog dare you!"

name: Maelstrom Portal
text: Deal_$1_damage to_all_enemy_minions. Summon_a_random\n1-Cost minion.
flavor: They bill this as a popular resort attraction, but they try and get your money up front.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Menacing Nimbus
text: Battlecry: Add a random Elemental to your hand.
flavor: Electra stores her elementals in the cloud.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

name: Murkspark Eel
text: Battlecry: If your deck has only even-Cost cards, deal_2 damage.
flavor: Makes shockingly good unagi.

name: Murmuring Elemental
text: Battlecry: Your next Battlecry this turn triggers_twice.
flavor: Déjà Dude.

name: Omega Mind
text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, your spells\n have Lifesteal this turn.
flavor: Has a side-business selling her lipstick shade, "Omega Red."

name: Perpetual Flame
text: Deal $3 damage to a random enemy minion. If it dies, recast this. Overload: (1)
flavor: Flame is perpetual.*\n\n *Perpetual only applies to current turn.

name: Primalfin Totem
text: At the end of your turn, summon a 1/1 Murloc.
flavor: Emits a sound only murlocs can hear, which is good because it’s REALLY annoying.

name: Reincarnate
text: Destroy a minion, then return it to life with full Health.
flavor: It's like birth, except you're an adult and you were just dead a second ago.
howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Rune Dagger
text: After your hero attacks, gain Spell Damage +1 this turn.
flavor: Turns out being stabbed makes you more vulnerable to magic.

name: Sandstorm Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (1)
flavor: Doot doot doot doot doot [Pause] Doot doot doot doot doot DEE doot doot doot doot doot!

name: Soul of the Murloc
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Murloc."
flavor: Previously thought nonexistent.

name: South Coast Chieftain
text: Battlecry: If you control another Murloc, deal 2_damage.
flavor: It got the conch. You let it speak!

name: Stormcrack
text: Deal $4 damage to a minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: WARNING: DO NOT TOUCH THE PURPLE BALL OF LIGHTNING

name: Stormforged Axe
text: Overload: (1)
flavor: Yo, that's a nice axe.

name: Tinyfin's Caravan
text: At the start of your turn, draw a Murloc.
flavor: Movin' right along, mrgl mrg mrgl mrg.

name: Totem Golem
text: Overload: (1)
flavor: What happens when you glue a buncha totems together.

name: Underbelly Angler
text: After you play a Murloc, add a random Murloc to your hand.
flavor: Attracts murlocs… and moths.

name: Vitality Totem
text: At the end of your turn, restore #4 Health to your hero.
flavor: You can usually find these at the totemist's market on Saturdays.

name: Windfury
text: Give a minion Windfury.
flavor: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Witch's Brew
text: Restore #4 Health. Repeatable this turn.
flavor: The swill has eyes!

name: Arid Stormer
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, gain Rush and Windfury.
flavor: Some people chase storms, some storms chase elementals.

name: Bog Slosher
text: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion to your hand and give it +2/+2.
flavor: It's the bane of freshly mopped floors everywhere.

name: Bogstrok Clacker
text: Battlecry: Transform adjacent minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
flavor: This clacker's crackers for hacking slackers into whack attackers.

name: Charged Call
text: [x]Discover a @-Cost minion and summon it. (Upgraded for each Overload card you played this game!)
flavor: You have a collect call from "AL'AKIR, LORD OF AIR AND THE FOUR WINDS." Do you accept these charges?

name: Drakkari Defender
text: Taunt\nOverload: (3)
flavor: Sometimes, the best defense is an offensive troll.

name: Electra Stormsurge
text: Battlecry: Your next spell this turn casts twice.
flavor: "The coin? You used me for THE COIN!?"

name: Elemental Destruction
text: Deal $4-$5 damage to all minions. Overload: (5)
flavor: I'm not a shaman or anything, but isn't Elemental Destruction the opposite of what they want to do?

name: Far Sight
text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.

name: Feral Spirit
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (1)
flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Shaman.

name: Grand Totem Eys'or
text: At the end of your turn,\ngive +1/+1 to all other Totems in your hand, deck and battlefield.
flavor: Some say it can see straight into the soul of any who dare to read its flavor text...

name: Haunting Visions
text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less. Discover a spell.
flavor: When you're awake at 3 AM and can't stop thinking about that time you called your teacher "mom."

name: Healing Rain
text: Restore #12 Health randomly split among all friendly characters.
flavor: It's filled with electrolytes!

name: Healing Wave
text: Restore #7 Health. Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, Restore #14 instead.
flavor: Favored by shaman who study the art of restoration and healing, this spell would feel smug, if it had feelings.

name: Hot Spring Guardian
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Restore #3_Health.
flavor: NONE SHALL PASS until at least an hour after eating.

name: Ice Breaker
text: Destroy any Frozen minion damaged by_this.
flavor: A great way to end a conversation.

name: Instructor Fireheart
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a spell that costs (1) or more. If you play it this turn, repeat this effect.
flavor: When you have fire in your heart, even death can't stop you.

name: Lady Vashj
text: [x]Spell Damage +1\nDeathrattle: Shuffle 'Vashj\nPrime' into your deck.
flavor: Personal handmaiden to Queen Azshara turned lieutenant to Illidan Stormrage. Also quite the hair sssstylist.

name: Lava Burst
text: Deal $5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavor: It's like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Lightning Breath
text:
[x]Deal $4 damage to a
minion. If you're holding
a Dragon, also damage
its neighbors.
flavor: Recipe: One dragon, four wool socks, thick shag carpet.

name: Lightning Storm
text: Deal $3 damage to all_enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.

name: Magicfin
text: After a friendly Murloc dies, add a random Legendary minion to your hand.
flavor: The best part is when he pulls Deathwing out of a top hat!

name: Mana Tide Totem
text: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavor: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: Marshspawn
text: Battlecry: If you cast\na spell last turn,\nDiscover a spell.
flavor: Hopes to someday promote to Marshsqueen.

name: Molten Blast
text: Deal $2 damage. Summon that many 1/1 Elementals.
flavor: Well, how would YOU celebrate after finals week?!

name: Nofin Can Stop Us
text: [x]Give your minions\n+1/+1. Give your\nMurlocs an extra +1/+1.
flavor: "I'm having a good time! I don't want to stop at all!"

name: Pit Master
text: Battlecry: Summon a 3/2_Duelist.\nCorrupt: Summon two.
flavor: If you win your duel, he'll throw in some of his famous Pit Master barbecue.

name: Plague of Murlocs
text: Transform all minions into random Murlocs.
flavor: This is horrible! And adorable!

name: Powermace
text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly Mech +2/+2.
flavor: People assume that shamans control the elements, but really, they have to ask them stuff and the elements are like, "Yeah ok, sure."

name: Primal Dungeoneer
text: [x]Battlecry: Draw a spell.\nIf it's a Nature spell, also\ndraw an Elemental.
flavor: They wanted a Mature Dungeoneer. Instead they got this.

name: Primal Talismans
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a random basic Totem."
flavor: All that remained from the first kobold colony: a single talisman and the word "Flamestrike."

name: Serpentshrine Portal
text: Deal $3 damage. Summon a random 3-Cost minion. Overload: (1)
flavor: This is why you never flush a three-cost minion.

name: Spirit Echo
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Return _this to your hand."
flavor: I guess you can say they’re… “soul survivors.”

name: Spirit of the Frog
text: [x]Stealth for 1 turn. Whenever you cast a spell, draw a spell from your deck that costs (1) more.
flavor: It is Wednesday, my dudes.

name: Stormstrike
text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Give your hero +3 Attack this turn.
flavor: When your phone is at 5%.

name: Tidal Surge
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $4 damage to a_minion.
flavor: Also good for removing pesky stains.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

name: Totemic Reflection
text: Give a minion +2/+2.\nIf it's a Totem, summon a copy of it.
flavor: "Upon reflection, I have decided that your board needs more ME."

name: Tuskarr Totemic
text: Battlecry: Summon a random basic Totem.
flavor: Turns out the tuskarr aren't real choosy about their totems.

name: Unbound Elemental
text: After you play a card_with Overload, gain_+1/+1.
flavor: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Battlecry: If you control\na Lackey, deal 3_damage.
flavor: Dr. Boom had one simple request: wasps with flippin' laser beams attached to their heads.

name: Whack-A-Gnoll Hammer
text: After your hero attacks, give a random friendly minion +1/+1.
flavor: Hogger's most hated attraction.

name: Zentimo
text: [x]Whenever you target a\nminion with a spell, cast it\nagain on its neighbors.
flavor: Serenity. Peace. Many frogs.

name: Ancestor's Call
text: Put a random minion from each player's hand into the battlefield.
flavor: "Hey! Ancestors!" - Ancestor's call

name: Avalanche
text: Freeze a minion and deal $3 damage to adjacent ones.
flavor: One of our more snowbally cards.

name: Bru'kan
text: Nature Spell Damage +3
flavor: Bru'kan, his body weathered and weary, felt his time nearing its end. Teaching brave champions like Rokara gives him hope for a greater future.
howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 25 Forged in the Barrens Legendary cards.

name: Call in the Finishers
text: Summon four 1/1 Murlocs.
flavor: When you really need a job done… but you don't really care if it gets done right.

name: Canal Slogger
text: Rush, Lifesteal\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "Another Monday in the canals huh? What a slog."

name: Charged Hammer
text: Deathrattle: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage.'
flavor: You can only pick it up if you are worthy.

name: Draenei Totemcarver
text: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each friendly Totem.
flavor: It's nice to find a real craftsman in this day and age of mass-produced totems.

name: Dunemaul Shaman
text: Windfury, Overload: (1)\n50% chance to attack the wrong enemy.
flavor: He just closes his eyes and goes for it. Raarararrrarar!

name: Dunk Tank
text: Deal $4 damage.\nCorrupt: Then deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavor: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

name: Earth Revenant
text: [x]Taunt\n Battlecry: Deal 1 damage\nto all enemy minions.
flavor: Have you guys seen a pair of rock legs lying around anywhere?

name: Fireguard Destroyer
text: Battlecry: Gain 1-4 Attack. Overload: (1)
flavor: Ragnaros interviews hundreds of Fire Elementals for the position of "Destroyer" but very few have what it takes.
howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

name: Flamewreathed Faceless
text: Overload: (2)
flavor: He's on fire! Boomshakalaka!

name: Granite Forgeborn
text: Battlecry: Reduce the cost of Elementals in your hand and deck by (1).
flavor: If he stops being useful, just turn him into a kitchen countertop.

name: Hex
text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?
howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

name: Jade Lightning
text: Deal $4 damage. Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem.@Deal $4 damage. Summon a Jade Golem.
flavor: Jade Lightning, goooo Jade Lightning!

name: Jinyu Waterspeaker
text: [x]Battlecry: Restore #6 Health.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: Waterspeakers can tell the future! So the Jade Lotus employs them to speculate on the Auction House.

name: Lotus Illusionist
text: [x]After this minion attacks\na hero, transform it into a\n_random 6-Cost minion.
flavor: If you think her Xavius and Sylvanas cosplay is great, wait till you see her Reno Jackson!

name: Master of Evolution
text: Battlecry: Transform a friendly minion into a random one that costs (1) more.
flavor: Will be really useful in the new "Hearthémon" game.

name: Rumbling Elemental
text: After you play a Battlecry minion, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavor: He's a very hungry elemental.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Scargil
text: Your Murlocs cost (1).
flavor: Wanna know how he got those scars? So does he.

name: Siltfin Spiritwalker
text: Whenever another friendly Murloc dies, draw a card. Overload: (1)
flavor: The elements respond to anyone who calls them for a worthy cause, even if you call them by yelling, "MRGHRGLGLGL!"

name: Spirit Alpha
text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon a 2/3\nSpirit Wolf with Taunt.
flavor: Just like in the natural world, the alpha of the species is bright purple.

name: Splitting Axe
text: Battlecry: Summon copies of your Totems.
flavor: The ancient shaman chant, "Control Axe, Control Vee."

name: Squallhunter
text: Spell Damage +2\nOverload: (2)
flavor: "Oh, the weather outside is frightful… But Squallhunter's so delightful!\n \nAnd since we've gone down this road--overload, overload, overload!"

name: Storm Chaser
text: Battlecry: Draw a spell from your deck that costs_(5) or more.
flavor: Best drank after a stiff gale.

name: The Fist of Ra-den
text: [x]After you cast a spell, summon a Legendary minion of that Cost. Lose 1 Durability.
flavor: The mighty Ra-den was known as the Keeper of Storms. Unfortunately, he could not keep his fist.

name: Thunderhead
text: [x]After you play a card with\nOverload, summon two\n1/1 Sparks with Rush.
flavor: Most of his friends are still Metalheads.

name: Torrent
text: [x]Deal $8 damage to a\nminion. Costs (3) less if\nyou cast a spell last turn.
flavor: Weeks of underwater cross-training have really built up her fourarms.

name: Totem Cruncher
text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy your Totems. Gain +2/+2 for each destroyed.
flavor: When regular totem hours won't cut it.

name: Vessina
text: While you're Overloaded, your other minions have +2 Attack.
flavor: She wasn't happy when Hagatha sent her back to Uldum. But her "angry" hiss sounds like her "happy" hiss, so no one knew the difference.

name: Vivid Spores
text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Resummon this minion."
flavor: Hey man, I just feel like... death is just a construct of our imaginations, ya know?

name: Wicked Witchdoctor
text: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a random basic_Totem.
flavor: You can easily defeat her by either dealing 4 damage, or dropping a house on her.
howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

name: Windspeaker
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
flavor: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

name: Bandersmosh
text: [x]Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a 5/5 copy of a random Legendary minion.
flavor: The Shudderwock finds him particularly frumious.

name: Bloodlust
text: Give your minions +3_Attack this turn.
flavor: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Boggspine Knuckles
text: After your hero attacks, transform your minions into random ones that cost (1) more.
flavor: I would NOT want to put my hand in there. It's... SQUISHY.

name: Corrupt Elementalist
text: Battlecry: Invoke Galakrond twice.
flavor: Her element is "Horns."

name: Cumulo-Maximus
text: Battlecry: If you have Overloaded Mana Crystals, deal 5 damage.
flavor: "Are your clouds not entertained?!"

name: Doomhammer
text: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavor: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

name: Dragon's Pack
text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. If you've Invoked twice, give them +3/+3.
flavor: Each dragon's pack is guaranteed to have at least one rare.

name: Earth Elemental
text: Taunt\nOverload: (2)
flavor: Nothing beats rock.

name: Hagatha's Scheme
text: Deal $@ damage\nto all minions.\n(Upgrades each turn!)
flavor: "All shall suffer!"\n"But Hagatha, those are your minions..."\n"I said ALL!!!"

name: Hallazeal the Ascended
text: Whenever your spells deal damage, restore that much Health to your hero.
flavor: Hallazeals all your dallazamage.

name: Hammer of Twilight
text: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/2 Elemental.
flavor: Stop! It's Twilight Hammer time.

name: Inara Stormcrash
text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
flavor: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

name: Lilypad Lurker
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, transform an enemy minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavor: Honestly, the frog did nothing wrong.

name: Mistrunner
text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3/+3.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: "Get IT off me!!!"

name: Muckmorpher
text: [x]Battlecry: Transform into\na 4/4 copy of a different\nminion in your deck.
flavor: Fan favorite in the muck morphin' sewer strangers.

name: Shattered Rumbler
text: Battlecry: If you cast a spell last turn, deal 2 damage to all other minions.
flavor: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO THE GROUND!

name: Thrall, Deathseer
text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.
flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."

name: Thunder Bluff Valiant
text: Inspire: Give your Totems +2 Attack.
flavor: Allowing totems to attack is not cheating.  I mean, there isn't anything in the rule books about it.

name: Totem Goliath
text: Deathrattle: Summon all four basic Totems.\nOverload: (1)
flavor: It was an art project, and nobody knew when to stop.

name: Volcano
text: Deal $15 damage randomly split among all_minions.\nOverload: (2)
flavor: Many young shaman summon a volcano as their first school project.

name: Voodoo Hexxer
text: Taunt\nFreeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavor: The Silver Hand recruits shuddered in terror when they saw the dreaded totem of the Hexxer: A tiny little snowman, impaled with pins.

name: White Eyes
text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Shuffle\n'The Storm Guardian' into your deck.
flavor: My life for Aya!

name: Windshear Stormcaller
text: Battlecry: If you control all 4 basic Totems, summon Al'Akir_the_Windlord.
flavor: Don't ever doubt Al'Akir's love for basic totems.

name: Eureka!
text: Summon a copy of_a_random minion from your hand.
flavor: Genius is 1% inspiration, and 99% drawing your Deathwing.

name: Fire Elemental
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
flavor: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Grumble, Worldshaker
text: Battlecry: Return your other minions to your hand. They cost (1).
flavor: The grumbling grew to a mighty rumbling, and out of the caverns the kobolds came tumbling.

name: Krag'wa, the Frog
text: Battlecry: Return all spells you played last turn to_your hand.
flavor: Krag'wa has a ritual to honor his friends and a ritual to devour his enemies. No one can tell them apart.

name: Moorabi
text: Whenever another minion is Frozen, add a copy of it to your hand.
flavor: Most disturbing is how Moorabi covers all those frozen minions with flavored syrup.

name: Nithogg
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 0/3 Eggs. Next turn they hatch into 4/4 Drakes with Rush.
flavor: Not to be confused with Nithogger.

name: Rain of Toads
text: Summon three 2/4 Toads with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: "Oh, THAT'S how she brings the warts!"

name: The Lurker Below
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to an enemy minion. If it dies, repeat on one of its neighbors.
flavor: "Throw it back! THROW IT BACK!"

name: The Mistcaller
text: Battlecry: Give all minions in your hand and deck +1/+1.
flavor: Calling the mist doesn't sound all that great.  "Ooooh, it is slightly damp now!"

name: The Storm Bringer
text: Transform your minions into random Legendary minions.
flavor: Finally, Electra can work from home.

name: Thing from Below
text: [x]Taunt Costs (1) less for each Totem you've summoned this game.
flavor: Just can't resist the opportunity to hang around with a bunch of totems.

name: Tiny Toys
text: Summon four random 5-Cost minions.\nMake them 2/2.
flavor: Mom, they're action figures!

name: Bogshaper
text: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a minion from your_deck.
flavor: The tricky part is getting them to HOLD their shape.

name: Earthquake
text: Deal $5 damage to all minions, then deal $2 damage to all minions.
flavor: Shake it, sh-sh-sh-shake it like a Kalimdor fissure.

name: Everyfin is Awesome
text: Give your minions +2/+2.\nCosts (1) less for each Murloc you control.
flavor: Everyfin is cool when you're part of a murloc team!
howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

name: Galakrond, the Tempest
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two\n2/2 Storms with Rush.\n(@)
flavor: Hagatha cried out over the winds: "Truly, you are as powerful as the Maelstrom!" To which the Tempest answered: "I AM THE MAELSTROM."

name: Jade Chieftain
text: Battlecry: Summon a{1} {0} Jade Golem. Give it Taunt. @Battlecry: Summon a Jade Golem. Give it Taunt.
flavor: Seeing his Jade Golem grow up into the tall, handsome 6/6 standing before him was the proudest moment of his life.

name: Lesser Sapphire Spellstone
text: Summon 1 copy of a friendly minion. @(Overload 3 Mana Crystals to upgrade.)
flavor:
A stone of blue, embraced with glee
By murloc lords beneath the sea
Soon numberless they swarmed the shore
First two, then four, then more...and more...

name: Neptulon
text: Battlecry: Add 4 random Murlocs to your hand. Overload: (3)
flavor: Neptulon is "The Tidehunter". He’s one of the four elemental lords. And he and Ragnaros get together and make really amazing saunas.

name: Stone Sentinel
text: Battlecry: If you played an Elemental last turn, summon two 2/3 Elementals with Taunt.
flavor: He and his friends just want to rock out.

name: Swampqueen Hagatha
text: [x]Battlecry: Add a 5/5\nHorror to your hand. Teach\nit two Shaman spells.
flavor: Rafaam mainly enjoys working with Hagatha because she never laughs at Dr. Boom's jokes.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.

name: Hagatha the Witch
text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions.
flavor: Curse-bringer, tree-twister, mother of wretched things…Hanzo main.

name: Kalimos, Primal Lord
text: [x]Battlecry: If you played an\nElemental last turn, cast an\nElemental Invocation.
flavor: All that's missing is a little heart.

name: The Runespear
text: After your hero attacks, Discover a spell\nand cast it with random targets.
flavor: When asked what the runes do, the tauren smith smiled: "A little of this, a little of that..."

name: Tidal Wave
text: Lifesteal\nDeal $3 damage to\nall minions.
flavor: "Hang Four, mon!"

name: Walking Fountain
text: Lifesteal, Rush, Windfury
flavor: The weirdest part is that it doesn't have legs.

name: Mogu Fleshshaper
text: [x]Rush. Costs (1) less for each\nminion on the battlefield.
flavor: He's here to shape *clap* you up!

name: Shudderwock
text: [x]Battlecry: Repeat all other Battlecries from cards you played this game (targets chosen randomly).
flavor: Beware the Shudderwock, my son. We're fresh out of vorpal daggers.

name: Eye of the Storm
text: Summon three 5/6 Elementals with Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavor: If that's the eye, I would hate to see the rest of the storm.

name: Snowfury Giant
text: Costs (1) less for each Mana Crystal you've Overloaded this game.
flavor: This minion goes all the way to 11!
